</div>
<div align="center">

<font size="4">**Making stuff that works. Sometimes. Potentially.**</font>

Numerous times have I thought "it would be cool if..." and then lost sleep until it actually worked. Most projects start messy, very few get polished, and only a few of those make it to the finish line. ScreenInput Framework for BeamNG is one of them.

</div>

<img src="https://capsule-render.vercel.app/api?type=rect&color=0:a277ff,100:61dafb&height=2" width="100%"/>

<!-- Featured Projects -->
<div align="center">

<font size="4">**Check out:**</font>

<div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 20px; flex-wrap: wrap;">
<div style="width: 50%; max-width: 50%; text-align: center;">

<font size="4">**[ScreenInput Framework](https://github.com/TheLeggy/BNG-ScreenInput-Framework)**</font>

Build interactive HTML displays for BeamNG vehicles that respond to clicks like a touchscreen.

<font size="2">**Key Features:**</font><br>
3D raycast-to-DOM event translation for natural interaction
<br>
Reference plane system for straightforward coordinate mapping
<br>
Persistent user settings across game sessions
<br>
Visual debugging tools for precise screen positioning

<font size="2">**Available As:**</font> <br>
[Shared Mod Dependency](#) - Shared dependency for your projects *(coming soon)*
<br>
[Working Showcase](https://www.beamng.com/resources/screeninput-framework.36906/) - Interactive demo on the Cherrier Vivace

**Tech:** <br>
<img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Lua-2C2D72?style=for-the-badge&logo=lua" alt="Lua" style="vertical-align: middle;"/> <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/JavaScript-F7DF1E?style=for-the-badge&logo=javascript&logoColor=303030" alt="JavaScript" style="vertical-align: middle;"/> <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/HTML-E34F26?style=for-the-badge&logo=html5&logoColor=white" alt="HTML" style="vertical-align: middle;"/>

<sub>Licensed under a custom MIT License. Please read it before using.</sub>

</div>
<div style="width: 50%; max-width: 50%; text-align: center;">

<font size="4">**[Bvue](https://theleggy.github.io/bvue/)**</font>

Fun little thing I made in an hour for a fun creature named Keo.

<font size="2">**Key Features:**</font><br>
Makes really pretty blues
<br>
Fun puns with blue (and blue-adjacents)
<br>
Interesting button style
<br>
Palette using cutting edge CSS


**Tech:** <br>
<img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Vue-4FC08D?style=for-the-badge&logo=Vuedotjs&logoColor=white" alt="Vue" style="vertical-align: middle;"/>
